question: What is the postion of Centre for Science and Environment (CSE) in the environment policy think tank in India as per the survey of The Think Tanks and Civil Societies Program (TTCSP)?
explanation: The Centre for Science and Environment (CSE) has been ranked the number one environment policy think tank in India. The ranking was done by The Think Tanks and Civil Societies Program (TTCSP) of the Lauder Institute at the University of Pennsylvania. In the world level, Centre for Science and Environment (CSE) has obtained 16th position. It has improved 2 positions compared to last year. CSE has ranked 2nd in India and 38th in world-level in the 'Energy and Resource Policy Think Tanks' category.
